definition: to boil/to roll/to take a hike/Get lost!

sentences.english: X axis and Y axis adopt ball spiral rods with excellent precisions and low friction factors.
sentences.chinese: 轴采用滚珠螺杆传动精度佳，摩擦系数小。

sentences.english: Ball screws for ram adjustment and crossrail adjustment.
sentences.chinese: 滑枕和横梁为滚珠丝杠。

sentences.english: Each axis travels on ball screw.
sentences.chinese: 每个轴行程的滚珠丝杆。

sentences.english: We are specialized in manufacturing the Ball, Needle and Roller Bearing.
sentences.chinese: 专业生产各种滚珠，圆锥，滚柱轴承。

sentences.english: The ball screw gantry provides precise positioning and high load carrying capacity.
sentences.chinese: 滚珠丝杠龙门提供精确定位和高承载能力。

sentences.english: Ball joint rod cold rolling project of zhejiang finite bearing co. ltd.
sentences.chinese: 丽水新亿特自动化技术有限公司冷轧滚珠丝杆项目。

sentences.english: Mechanical model is analysed and on ball-screw drive systems in high-speed motion.
sentences.chinese: 对滚珠丝杠进给系统机械模型进行了合理的分析。

sentences.english: The compliance effect of a high-speed ball-screw feed-drive system is modeled in this work.
sentences.chinese: 文中建立了高速滚珠丝杠进给系统屈服形变模型。

sentences.english: Imported ball bearing leas screw and linear guide rail have ensured a repeated positioning precision of the machine tool.
sentences.chinese: 进口滚珠丝杠及直线导轨确保了机床的重复定位精度。

sentences.english: Low torque required to drive the load due to high efficiency ball screw.
sentences.chinese: 低扭矩所需的驱动负载，由于高效率的滚珠丝杠。

sentences.english: Donglai Company is a special company producing precision rolling ball screws.
sentences.chinese: 东来公司是制造精密滚珠丝杠副的专业公司。

sentences.english: The shape of the ball screws were detailed elaborated which was fit for the NC machine for high speed.
sentences.chinese: 详细阐述了适合高速化数控机床的滚珠丝杠副形式。

sentences.english: A ball bearing had bounced off the submarine's hull.
sentences.chinese: 潜艇船身上崩掉了一个滚珠轴承。

sentences.english: The use of ball bearings and self-lubrication can prolong the life of the machine.
sentences.chinese: 使用滚珠轴承和自身润滑能最大地延长机器寿命。

sentences.english: Ball screw is installed on a limited digital devices.
sentences.chinese: 滚珠丝杠上安装有限位装置。

sentences.english: Our company deals in ball bearings.
sentences.chinese: 我们公司经营滚珠轴承。

definition: to spread litter in a cowshed, pigsty etc
